column2: This person holds the reigns of power within the empire.
This person is trusted with the daily protection of his or her lord.

With Swan meat being without doubt the finest meat available from either beast or fowl, the need to ensure a steady supply of Swans is important. The post of Master of Swans carries a certain amount of prestige.
column3: Le cygne étant indéniablement la viande la plus fine qui soit, il est important d’en avoir suffisamment à disposition. Le titre de gardien des cygnes est auréolé d’un certain prestige.
column4: Da Schwanenfleisch zweifelsohne zum besten Wild- oder Geflügelfleisch gehört, ist die Organisation eines stetigen Nachschubs an Schwänen eine wichtige Aufgabe. Das Amt des Schwanenhüters ist mit gewissem Prestige verbunden.
column6: Ya que, sin duda, la carne de cisne es más exquisita que la de otros animales y aves, era importante garantizar que hubiera cisnes siempre disponibles. El cargo de maestro de cisnes trae consigo bastante prestigio.

column2: Although most of the household duties were passed over to servants, a person was still necessary to direct them.
Poison is always a danger, so being entrusted with serving drinks is a great honor.
column3: L’empoisonnement constitue un danger et se voir confier le privilège de servir à boire est un grand honneur.
column4: Da Giftanschläge stets ein Gefahr darstellten, war es eine große Ehre, am Hof Getränke reichen zu dürfen.
column6: El envenenamiento era siempre un riesgo, por lo que ganarse la confianza de servir bebidas es un gran honor.

column2: Despot is the highest honorary title in the Empire.
The Imperial Eunuch takes care of the Emperor, Empress, and royal family.
Eunuchs perform many valued court functions and can be trusted in the presence of women.
column3: Les Eunuques remplissent de précieuses fonctions et la gent féminine peut leur faire confiance.
column4: Eunuchen nahmen eine Vielzahl hochangesehener Funktionen am Hofe wahr und man vertraute ihnen in der Gegenwart von Frauen.
column6: Los eunucos realizan muchas functiones valoradas de la corte y son de confiansa en presencia de mujeres.

This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for maintenance of the Imperial Clan's genealogy. This position can only be held by a member of the Imperial family.
This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for matters related to agriculture.
This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for matters related to ritual.

This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for matters related to Imperial household.
This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for matters related to justice.
This minister holds great esteem within the empire. He is responsible for matters related to administration.
Responsible for the organization of feasts and domestic entertainment. Although left mainly in the hands of deputies, the key role at such major occasions makes the post prestigious.
